statements: UPDATE legislative_documents SET document_type = 'Law' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE legislative_documents SET document_content = 'Updated content' , document_title = 'New Title' WHERE document_id = 2;
UPDATE legislative_documents SET document_title = 'Amendment Proposal', date_created = NOW() WHERE document_id = 1001
UPDATE legislative_documents SET document_content = 'This is an important bill amendment', document_type = 'Amendment' WHERE document_id = 1002
UPDATE bills SET bill_title = 'Bill 1 Updated' WHERE bill_id = 1;
UPDATE resolutions SET resolution_text = 'Resolution Text Updated' WHERE resolution_id = 2;
UPDATE bills SET bill_title = 'New Title', bill_text = 'Updated Text' WHERE bill_id = 1;
UPDATE resolutions SET resolution_text = 'Revised Content', resolution_title = 'Amended Title' WHERE resolution_id = 2;
